overview:
Lex is the founder of Roxer, a website that allows users to build their own websites. Lex is currently is in charge of building and maintaining everything from Roxer’s network infrastructure all the way up to the nifty see-through UI.

In a past life he was a Web Application security specialist and co-founder of WhiteHat Security. Previous to that Lex has been a software engineer, movie extra, barista, magician, candy maker, and radio dj.
